CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE($User.User_Contact_ID__c, "'", "\\'") = SUBSTITUTE(Primary_Handler__c, "'", "\\'") || SUBSTITUTE($User.User_Contact_ID__c, "'", "\\'") = SUBSTITUTE(Additional_Handler1__c, "'", "\\'") || SUBSTITUTE($User.User_Contact_ID__c, "'", "\\'") = SUBSTITUTE(Additional_Handler_2__c, "'", "\\'")
CustomField.label: Contact RM is Current User
